summary: Adds gloves to the hands of all variants of the Thieves Guild Gloves (male and female)
descriptionHtml:
==========
Description
==========
This mod simply adds actual gloves to the Thieves Guild Gloves (see pictures if you don\'t understand). This is a rather simple little idea but, in my opinion, makes the entire Thieves Guild outfit look incredible. 

This does change all variants (male and female) of the gloves, regular brown, gray Linwe variant, and the black master gloves.

======
Update
======
Completely rebuilt mod
-Achieves same product in much cleaner fashion
-Can now be deactivated via .esp

==========
Installation
==========
Use NMM as you would with any other mod (recommended)
or...
Drag contents to the Data folder

============
Uninstallation
============
Use NMM as you would with any other mod (recommended, again)
or...
Delete contents

======
Credits
======
Bethesda for creating the game and CK
People who made GIMP for GIMP
Makers of Nifskope for Nifskope
author: Hatwig
